about_opensource_message: We welcome contributions to this application. If you are interested, please join us on Github at
about_message_1: Sqrl is a standalone desktop application that connects directly to the TELOS blockchain through the API endpoint of your choice.
about_message_2: Your keys never leave the application itself and are only ever stored encrypted, providing the highest level of security a hot wallet can offer.
about_more: Please visit us at https://telosfoundation.io and https://eos.miami if you would like to learn more.
about_issues: If you have encounter problems with the application itself, please file an issue on github below:
about_greymass_message_1: Sqrl is a fork of eos-voter 0.5.1. It was created by EOS Miami as an all-in-one tool to support all EOSIO chains, including Telos and EOS. Naming credit goes to Douglas Horn at Goodblock with SqrlJs + styling development credited to Amplified Telos.
about_greymass_message_2: If you would like to learn more about our team and the other projects we have planned for TELOS, we invite you to visit us at
